page.title: 02Communications-Grundisburgh
page.content: Postal Service: Postal town,Woodbridge, 5 kms. 2 collections of mail per day from 5 letter boxes. Mail delivered locally by local postlady; local "sort" at village P.O. Heavier parcels often to be collected from P.O. or Van Delivery. Telephone: Private - Lines to subscribers may be available subject to delay in installation. Telephone: Public - One Telephone Box in the whole of an outspread community; not always in operation. Citizens Band Radio: Some local activity. Public Service Radio: Available in times of emergency. Local Delivery Services: All major firms service area.
